# Test Project Brief

**Project:** E2E Test Application  
**Type:** Validation Project  
**Created:** 2025-12-17T03:40:10.965Z

## Vision
Build a simple test application for validating the Neural Autonomy Engine end-to-end workflow.

## Features

### Feature 1: User Authentication
- User registration
- Login/logout
- Password reset

### Feature 2: Dashboard
- User dashboard with stats
- Recent activity feed
- Quick actions

### Feature 3: Data Visualization
- Charts for data trends
- Export capabilities
- Real-time updates

## Technical Requirements

### Frontend
- React 19 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- React Router for navigation

### Backend
- Node.js with Fastify
- PostgreSQL database
- JWT authentication

### Infrastructure
- Docker containerization
- CI/CD with GitHub Actions
- AWS deployment

## Success Criteria
- All features implemented
- >80% test coverage
- <2s page load time
- Accessible (WCAG AA)
